channel.title: Hi i need help can't shot out D Arrows
channel.description:
hmm... this is hard to explain but.. I just added Dragon Arrows i putted it on arrows section in item4.java...
Well when i was playing in the game with those arrows then i wielded it and tried to shot em out but when i doo it then it says i don't have any arrows on me...
Rune Arrows Work BuT not Dragon arrows.. How Do i change that u need dragon arrows insteand of rune?
